ingredients.item: 3 limes, juice of 2, 1 cut into wedges

instructions.step: Put 1Â½ packs of blueberries and all the other ingredients except the lime wedges in a blender and whizz on low until combined. Slowly increase the speed to high and whizz until smooth. Stir in a little water, if needed, to reach your desired consistency. Squeeze in more lime juice, to taste, and top with the remaining blueberries.
